# [Interview #1158: OdysseyCon 2016, Entry #23](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1158#23)

#### Blightsong

Does Baon's name sound Selish for a reason?

#### Brandon Sanderson

No, that just a coincidence. That was before I had written Elantris, so.
